title: Metal nanowire-based transparent electrode for flexible and stretchable optoelectronic devices
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,7784-7827
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00080C, Review Article
Yu Ding, Sixing Xiong, Lulu Sun, Yiying Wang, Yinhua Zhou, Yaowen Li, Jun Peng, Kenjiro Fukuda, Takao Someya, Ruiyuan Liu, Xiaohong Zhang
This review provides the state-of-the-art solution-processed metal nanowire-based flexible transparent electrodes and their applications in optoelectronic devices.
